alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 11 at 2:23AM CST until March 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lowest visibilities will occur with heavy snowfall rates this morning. There will be a lull in impacts this afternoon and evening before northerly winds increase bringing additional blizzard conditions through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
